properties.name: dapr.cloudconfig.enabled
properties.description: enable dapr cloud config or not.

properties.name: dapr.cloudconfig.timeout
properties.description: timeout for getting dapr config (include wait for dapr sidecar).

properties.name: dapr.cloudconfig.wait-sidecar-enabled
properties.description: whether enable dapr client wait for sidecar, if no response, will throw IOException.

properties.name: dapr.cloudconfig.wait-sidecar-retries
properties.description: retries of dapr client wait for sidecar.
